title: Google won’t stop replacing our news headlines with terrible AI
full_text:
Google won’t stop replacing our news headlines with terrible AI. In early December, I brought you the news that Google has begun replacing Verge headlines, and those of our competitors, with AI clickbait nonsense in its content feed. Google appeared to be backing away from the experiment, but now tells The Verge that its A….
It now says AI headlines are a feature, not an experiment. It now says AI headlines are a feature, not an experiment. by Sean HollisterClose Posts from this … [+7239 chars]
